Description_lang: Call upon Annhylde's Aegis for protection, absorbing damage you take from enemies in front of you by $s3 for $d. When $s1 damage has been prevented, the shield breaks and expels coalesced power dealing $s4 Holy damage to enemies in front of you.
AuraDescription_lang: Preventing up to $s3 damage from enemies in front of you. Will shatter after $w1 more damage is absorbed.
